snippet.title: Pull Stay - Trailer for Guerrilla Collective (2020)
snippet.description:
📢Kickstarter is on live NOW! 👉https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1363912222/pull-stay?ref=c27tjq
I need your help to deliver Pull Stay in time..!😭
Back the game and make the world weirder! ヽ(≧∀≦)ﾉ

🎮 Wishlist on Steam! 👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/1179890/Pull_Stay/
Pull Stay is a wacky Beat 'em up game with Tower Defense mechanics. Use your fists or set crazy traps to repel enemies from rushing into your house! Defend your buddy Susumu, who goes out of his house only once in every two months for his haircut!

🎵Trailer Music by
  パトリチェフ(patirchev) 👉 https://twitter.com/patirchev

💎Follow Pull Stay game development! 💎
Discord 👉 https://discord.gg/dS4xBTg
Twitter 👉 https://twitter.com/EternalStew

💛🖤Guerrilla Collective💛🖤
 - Website 👉 https://www.guerrillacollective.com/
 - Twitch 👉 https://www.twitch.tv/guerrillacollective
